name: .HDPMX File Extension
summary: Learn about .HDPMX files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: File used by HotDocs, a document preparation application commonly used for generating legal and insurance forms; saves variable mapping information that allows third-party applications to interface with HotDocs.

content: HDPMX files are also called "Publisher Answer Source Mapping" files.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
